verses.text: \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w*, \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* measuring line \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* hand.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Whither goest thou? \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w To|strong="H0413"\w* measure \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w see|strong="H0834"\w* \w how|strong="H4100"\w* great \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* breadth thereof, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w how|strong="H4100"\w* great \w the|strong="H0853"\w* length thereof.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* angel \w that|strong="H7200"\w* spoke \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* went forth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* another angel went \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* meet \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Run, \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H0428"\w* young \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: Jerusalem \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* inhabited \w without|strong="H3808"\w* walls, \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w reason|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* beasts \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst thereof.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H7200"\w* Lord, \w a|strong="H7200"\w* wall \w of|strong="H0376"\w* fire round \w about|strong="H5375"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* glory \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* midst thereof.

\w O|strong="H0859"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* flee ye \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w of|strong="H0753"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H0753"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* north, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* scattered \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* four winds \w of|strong="H0753"\w* heaven, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord.
O Sion, \w flee|strong="H3318"\w*, thou \w that|strong="H2009"\w* dwellest \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H4397"\w* Babylon:

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* thus saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H3427"\w* hosts: \w After|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* glory \w he|strong="H3389"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* nations \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* robbed \w you|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* toucheth \w you|strong="H0413"\w*, toucheth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* apple \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H8432"\w* eye:

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* behold \w I|strong="H0589"\w* lift \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* prey \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w served|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H8432"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* know \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts sent \w me|strong="H0589"\w*.

Sing \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Sion: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* behold \w I|strong="H3588"\w* come, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thee: saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1323"\w* many nations \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* joined \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H4422"\w* day, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* they \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* \w my|strong="H4422"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* I \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* midst \w of|strong="H1323"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H1323"\w* thou shalt know \w that|strong="H4422"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H1323"\w* hosts hath sent me \w to|strong="H3427"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* possess Juda \w his|strong="H3068"\w* portion \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sanctified land: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* choose \w Jerusalem|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* flesh \w be|strong="H1961"\w* silent \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* risen \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w*. holy habitation.
